profile.name: Daniel Balcarek
profile.shortBio: Specializing in modern web applications using .NET Core and Angular.
profile.longBio: I am a Senior Software Engineer specializing in building modern web applications using .NET Core and Angular. I focus on solution architecture, design patterns, and SOLID principles to deliver applications that are maintainable, scalable, and easy to extend. My expertise spans backend development with C# and .NET Core, as well as frontend development with TypeScript and Angular.
profile.philosophy: As a software craftsman, I actively follow new trends and best practices. I place strong emphasis on code quality, testing, and optimal test coverage ensuring long-term reliability.

projects.title: Nebula Enterprise CRP
projects.description: Cloud-native resource planning system for inter-galactic trade.
projects.problemStatement: Legacy systems were unable to handle the scale of multi-planetary transactions.
projects.solution: Microservices architecture using .NET 8 and Azure Kubernetes Service.

projects.title: Quasar Analytics
projects.problemStatement: Need for sub-millisecond data processing from thousands of IoT sensors.
projects.solution: Event-driven architecture utilizing Apache Kafka and SignalR.

projects.title: Droid Command Center
projects.description: Fleet management interface for autonomous units.
projects.problemStatement: Operators lacked a unified view of deployed units.
projects.solution: SPA with complex state management using NgRx.
